law.history: Repealed 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 45, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 174, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 9. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 3. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 1. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 11, effective June 15, 1950.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Application for certificate, permit, or change therein -- Fee.
